787730.name: Adventure Game
787730.description:
A VR adventure game: explore dungeons, fight wicked beasts, collect treasure, and solve puzzles to uncover the mysteries of a strange island

Features:
-For Oculus Rift and HTC Vive (request support for others)
-Hover locomotion (intended) with support for teleportation mode (except in water)
-Spatialized audio
-Dungeons, shops, and secret rooms spread across an island (30 acres)
-Traditional fantasy monsters: oozes, reptilians, skeleton
-Traditional action RPG puzzles

Updated occasionally with new content and other improvements
787730.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
